resources.string: Auto Test
Logo
Welcome to your final exam!
Please fill in your name and your e-mail below and then start the test! Good Luck!
Your Name
Your E-mail
Read carefully every question and give/choose the right answer! Every question have at least one correct answer. To pass the exam, you have to answer correct 8 out of 10 questions!
Question 1:
What route(s) you have to follow to turn left at intersection?
Image of question 1
Answer 1: write down the number of the route(s)
You didin\'t answer to question 1! Please review question 1 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 2:
Driving speed must not exceed 30km/h in localities or 50km/h outside of the localities:
A. when meeting \"Priority Road\" sign;
B. in particularly, when there are dangerous curves accordingly signaled or when visibility is less than 50m;
C. when driving in the same direction with buses stopped at the station, on roads with one lane on the way.
You didin\'t answer to question 2! Please review question 2 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 3:
What is the right signaling when driving backward?
A. intermittent clapping to alert traffic participants behind the vehicle;
B. reverse lights signaling with vehicle back-lights;
C. use of emergency warning lights.
You didin\'t answer to question 3! Please review question 3 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 4:
Which is the optimal route to turn around in the intersection shown below?
Image of question 4
Answer 4: write down the number of the route(s)
You didin\'t answer to question 4! Please review question 4 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 5:
What is the driverâ€™s frequently misconduct that causes clutch failure?
A. lowering the slopes with the engine stopped or bringing the gear shifter to neutral;
B. driving with large wear at the clutch pedal or at the steering gear;
C. waiting at the semaphore with the clutch pedal pressed.
You didin\'t answer to question 5! Please review question 5 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 6:
Which of the two vehicles will first enter the intersection?
Image of question 6
A. motorcycle because it moves faster;
B. motorcycle as it moves ahead;
C. the car as it moves on the priority road.
You didin\'t answer to question 6! Please review question 6 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 7:
Speed will be reduced and the vehicle will be stopped:

A. when driving on a road with a traffic lane in the direction of travel, the forward movement is obstructed by an obstacle or the presence of other road users, and other vehicles are running oppositely;
B. to the border police signal;
C. when barriers or semi-barriers are lowered, are in the way down or are being lifted.
You didin\'t answer to question 7! Please review question 7 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 8:
In what order the three cars will pass through the crossroad?
Image of question 8
A. the red, blue and then green car;
B. the green, red and then blue car;
C. the blue, red and then green car.
You didin\'t answer to question 8! Please review question 8 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 9:
For the purposes of ecological driving a car is recommended:
A. to avoid carrying unnecessary objects in the luggage compartment or on the seats;
B. to not permanently mount the additional trunk on the vehicle;
C. to use additional spoilers and headlights.
You didin\'t answer to question 9! Please review question 9 and try to give the correct answer!
Question 10:
Which of the vehicles will enter last in intersection?
Image of question 10
A. the car;
B. the bus;
C. the truck.
You didin\'t answer to question 10! Please review question 10 and try to give the correct answer!
